thread.title: Amber Rose and ex-husband Wiz Khalifa throw son Sebastian epic superhero birthday party
thread.title_full: Amber Rose and ex-husband Wiz Khalifa throw son Sebastian epic superhero birthday party

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Amber Rose and ex-husband Wiz Khalifa throw son Sebastian epic superhero birthday party
text:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BQvs9stBIW0/?taken-by=amberrose&hl=en/embed 
"And every time your baby says something like, 'Oh, this is relaxing,' you be like a thesaurus and you give [them] a different way to say it every single time so they learn. 
"I gave him a piece of strawberry gum, and he was so dramatic when I gave it to him because he said, 'Oooh, Mommy, this gum feels so therapeutic.' 
"And I just laughed on the floor until I cried." 
And Amber also doesn't want any mothers-to-be to be too worried about becoming a mother as it's easy to just "figure things out along the way". 
She told PEOPLE magazine: "I read every single book, when I was pregnant, about being a mom and being pregnant and doing the right thing, and then I had my baby and I was just like, 'What the hell do I do now?' Your maternal instinct comes in, and you figure it out along the way. And thatâ€™s the fun part about it." Like us on Facebook
